Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED3 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCRED3 ( ITCRED3CODI, PROYCODI, IDCIRCUITO, BARRAP, BARRAS, BARRAT, CDGTRAFO, OPRTAP, POSTAP, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCRED3CODI, :PROYCODI, :IDCIRCUITO, :BARRAP, :BARRAS, :BARRAT, :CDGTRAFO, :OPRTAP, :POSTAP, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCRED3 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, IDCIRCUITO = :IDCIRCUITO, BARRAP = :BARRAP, BARRAS = :BARRAS, BARRAT = :BARRAT, CDGTRAFO = :CDGTRAFO, OPRTAP = :OPRTAP, POSTAP = :POSTAP, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCRED3CODI = :ITCRED3CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED3 ORDER BY ITCRED3CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCRED3 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED3 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCRED3CODI ASC
